title: Wild Fire
description: Alternate cover edition of ASIN B077D286J3*This is a Reverse Harem series with graphic scenes, mature language, and mature themes. Suitable for ages 18+* *Full length novel of 100,000 words*  Riley has her pride and now it seems like their lives might go up in flames as hunters target them. Secrets of the pride's past come to light, old grudges resurface, and Riley needs to stay strong if she's going to survive. Not only against their enemies, but also with her own pride, the five males who have carved a place in her life and offered her a family she'd never had.  The hunters won't be the only thing that underestimated the cheetah of the Kingson Pride and Riley will need to learn how to fight fire with fire.
author: Kristen Banet
